```{r libs}
library(blorr)
```

### Forward Selection

#### Model

```{r mod1}
model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science, data = hsb2,
  family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
```

#### Selection Summary

```{r forward1}
blr_forward_selection(model)
```

#### Detailed Output

```{r forward2}
blr_forward_selection(model, details = TRUE)
```

### Backward Elimination

#### Model

```{r mod2}
model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science + math + prog + socst, data = hsb2, family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
```

#### Selection Summary

```{r backward1}
blr_backward_elimination(model)
```

#### Detailed Output

```{r backward2}
blr_backward_elimination(model, details = TRUE)
```

### Stepwise Selection

#### Model

```{r mod3}
model <- glm(y ~ ., data = stepwise)
```

#### Selection Summary

```{r stepwise1}
blr_stepwise_selection(model)
```

#### Detailed Output

```{r stepwise2}
blr_stepwise_selection(model, details = TRUE)
```
